venue.name: Scibelli Enterprise Center, Across from STCC, downstairs media room

item.description:
Public Meeting August 1, 2012 7PM

Note: Anyone can come to a public meeting! You do not have to be a dues-paying IRN member.

The IRN presents:

Â 

Michael Taylor is a combination of strategic thinker and hands-on engineer, conceptual designer and detailed craftsman. His diverse career spans 30-plus years as a research scientist, mechanical engineer, writer, marketing professional, carpenter, furniture builder, machinist and professional videographer.

His diverse projects range from high-energy laser development to semiconductor manufacturing to kitchen appliance design. A veteran of several high-technology start-up companies, Michael founded Berkshire Innovations in 2007 as a product development consulting company.

An internal project to develop a patented folding bread proofer for home bakers has become the central focus of the company. The Brod & Taylor Folding Proofer (www.brodandtaylor.com) was released for sale in October of 2011. Enjoying brisk sales during its first season, the proofer has been picked up by major U.S. and International retailers.
item.name: IRN Public Meeting - Aug 1 - Berkshire Innovations
